alert.note: Alert for Brown (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 01 at 7:58PM CDT until June 05 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois... La Moine River at Ripley. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO LATE SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...La Moine River at Ripley. * WHEN...From late tonight to late Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Township road, downstream of the gage on the right bank, begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 20.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 24.0 feet early Friday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Fri Sat Sun Mon Tue La Moine River Ripley 22.0 20.2 23.9 23.1 19.9 15.9 13.2 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
